id: FBI Investigating new plot to frame Mueller for sexual harassment
paragraph: The FBI is investigating a plot by a Republican-linked operative trying to frame Special Counsel Mueller with made-up allegations of harassment or sexual misconduct. Former Federal Prosecutor John Flannery tells Ari Melber “there are very serious penalties involved” for anyone trying to “influence” the Russia probe by launching false attacks against Mueller.Oct. 30, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
